title: Terminate {{employeeName}}
subtitle: Set their last day of work and choose how to handle their final payroll.

lastDayOfEmployment.label: Last day of work
lastDayOfEmployment.description: The last day must be after their most recent regular payroll period (even if they were paid $0). If they never started working, the dismissal date has to be on or after the hire date.

payrollOption.label: How should the final payroll be handled?
payrollOption.description: We recommend running a dismissal payroll. Make sure you meet your state's requirements about employees' final payment (deadline to pay, unused PTO, etc).

dismissalPayroll.label: Dismissal payroll
dismissalPayroll.description: Run an off-cycle payroll to pay the employee their final wages immediately. This is required in some states.

regularPayroll.label: Regular payroll
regularPayroll.description: The employee will receive their final wages on their current pay schedule.

anotherWay.label: Another way
anotherWay.description: Handle the final payment manually (e.g., paper check). No payroll will be created.

validation.lastDayRequired: Last day of work is required
validation.payrollOptionRequired: Please select how to handle the final payroll
